meanings.sent1: The hyperexcitement of the children at the birthday party was contagious.
meanings.sent2: Her hyperexcitement about the upcoming vacation was palpable.
meanings.sent3: The hyperexcitement of the puppy over a simple toy was adorable to watch.
meanings.sent4: The hyperexcitement in the air before the big game was electrifying.
meanings.sent5: The hyperexcitement of the fans filled the stadium with energy.

meanings.definition: The state of being overly stimulated or aroused.
meanings.sent1: The hyperexcitement in the room made it hard to focus on the task at hand.
meanings.sent2: His hyperexcitement over the new project was evident in his enthusiastic gestures.
meanings.sent3: The hyperexcitement of the cat chasing a laser pointer was amusing to everyone.
meanings.sent4: The hyperexcitement of the market before the product launch was like a wave of anticipation.
meanings.sent5: The hyperexcitement of the students before the exam was almost tangible.
